content:
Based on the information you provided, it sounds like a very serious situation. Your safety is of the utmost importance, so I would recommend that you immediately evacuate your house and seek shelter in a safe location away from the path of the blue ball of flame.

If you have a local emergency service or civil defense agency, you may want to contact them to inform them of the situation and seek their advice on how to proceed.

In general, it's always better to err on the side of caution in situations like this, so please take all necessary precautions to ensure your safety and the safety of those around you.
